description: We should be using toxml() instead of toprettyxml() for our xml responses.  toprettyxml()  will add indents and whitespace, and I think this is unnecessary.
title: OSAPI: don't use toprettyxml() for XML responses

comments.content: We should be using toxml() instead of toprettyxml() for our xml responses.  toprettyxml()  will add indents and whitespace, and I think this is unnecessary.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~throughnothing

comments.content: Waiting on lp:~rackspace-titan/nova/minidom-to-etree to get in before I tackle this.

comments.content: Raising the importance as we have gotten some complaints from users failing to parse the prettified output.
